name: .AD_PRT
summary: Learn about .AD_PRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an AD_PRT file in Alibre Design (Windows). To add an AD_PRT file to an assembly, select the Part/Subassembly button located in Alibre Design's Assembly toolbar. This will open the Insert Part/Subassembly window, from which you can select and insert your AD_PRT file.
If you want to create a new Alibre Design part, click the New Part button located in Alibre Design's Assembly toolbar. This will open Alibre Design's part design tools.

To export an AD_PRT file as a STEP file, open the file in Alibre Design's part designer. Then, select Save as... and save the file as a STEP file. This will allow you to use the part in other CAD programs.
